name: Learn to read and write Japanese kanji
description: Free API to the Kanji alive web application with CC-BY licensed language data on Japanese kanji, radicals and associated media files.

api_methods.name: Kanji grade level
api_methods.description: The Advanced Search URL parameters are described here as individual endpoints to permit per parameter testing. Parameters may be combined as required.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all the kanji characters that Japanese second graders learn?
List the kanji taught in grade 5 in Japanese schools.
I want to practice the kanji that are introduced in the first grade curriculum.
Give me the set of kanji for grade 3 students.
Which kanji are part of the grade 6 syllabus?
Find all kanji characters that are typically learned in grade 4.
I’m interested in reviewing the kanji assigned to grade 7.
Show me the kanji list for grade 8.
Could you provide the kanji that Japanese students study in grade 9?
Tell me which kanji are included in the grade 10 curriculum.
